about_the_game:
This is the adventure of a legendary knight, returning home to find that his town has been looted and all the inhabitants of a peaceful town have been kidnapped. It's up to you to free all the inhabitants, battling various monsters and bosses. Fight your way through mysterious labyrinths, caves and castles in this metroidvania game in search of the town's inhabitants. Upgrade weapons, cast spells on monsters and buy potions with doubloons and gold.

■ A world of castles and dungeons and plenty of battles with monsters and bosses.
■ Bloodthirsty monsters want to kill you.
■ Buy new items, potions from dungeon dwellers.
■ A dangerous open world, with various secret areas.
■ The Mage - a kind wizard, will enchant your weapons to defeat the bosses.
■ The Alchemist - an old speculator, will sell you any kind of potion.
■ The Treasure Seeker - a professional who knows where the treasure chests lie.
■ Monsters and bosses are your insidious enemies, destroy them and get the treasure.
■ Challenge the world of monsters and strange creatures in their insidious kingdom.
■ Upgrade by acquiring powerful new skills and abilities!
■ More than 60 enemies! 15 epic bosses! Fight fierce monsters and defeat bosses.

Find a Wizard to enchant weapons for doubloons and crystals, and an alchemist to sell you a potion.
The treasure hunter is your lucky charm, he'll help you find your way to the chest for a pretty penny.


Residents of the city - save them and they will reward you.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card before 2009 may not work

short_description: Prepare for a brutal metroidvania where a legendary knight battles monsters to save his land. Explore dangerous labyrinths and castles, fight enemies, and craft powerful gear with the help of the Mage, Alchemist, and Treasure Hunter. Ready for epic adventures?
